description: A magical winter night adventure with a guiding star.
name: Winter Wish

pages.image_prompt: storybook illustration, cozy night scene, warm indoor lighting, {name} sitting beside a snowy window, gazing out at the night sky full of stars, gentle snow falling outside, soft painterly texture, emotional winter atmosphere
pages.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted face, deformed hands, low quality, overexposed, multiple people, extra limbs, watermark, text
pages.positive_prompt: watercolor painting, high detail, ultra resolution , a {age}-year-old {gender}, sitting on a bench looking upward, looking at the night sky full of big stars, clear sky, wearing a red winter coat with white fur collar, blue mittens, brown snow boots, and a yellow knitted hat, tale and magical background, big moon
pages.story_text: {name}, a {age}-year-old child, sat on a bench watching snowflakes fall softly outside. {they} dreamed of meeting a real star one day.

pages.story_text: One night, {name} saw a bright streak of light cross the sky. A tiny glowing star landed gently on the snow outside.

pages.story_text: {name} knelt in the snow and picked up the tiny star. Its light glowed warmly in {their} hands, and for the first time, {they} felt a magical warmth inside.

pages.image_prompt: peaceful morning winter scene, {name} standing in snow looking up at the sky, a single bright star glowing above, warm sunrise colors, snow-covered village in background, emotional closure, soft painterly tone

pages.story_text: As dawn came, the star floated back to the sky. {name} waved goodbye, smiling as one star in the morning light shone brighter than all the rest.
